attributes.action: Make Sure Immigrants Can Work Before Giving them Benefits
attributes.additional_details: Immigrants come to this countries and weather you believe it or not it says in the book they are given when they come here and I quote 'Coming to the UK and Claiming Benefits' and if you think it should say something like 'Coming to the UK and working' I understand that some immigrants come and do all of the rubbish jobs that we are to lazy to do but some come over and really do drain the system of benefits...
